entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianDescription
entry.value: Decreased Morale loss. Increased Accuracy and Morale regeneration when adjacent to other Praetorians.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianFlavor
entry.value: The life of a Praetorian prepared them for facing any situation head-on, especially when linked with their brothers-in-arms.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/SneeringImperialist
entry.value: Sneering Imperialist

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/SneeringImperialistDescription
entry.value: Increased Accuracy and Attacks against Neutral enemies. Increased Accuracy against Orks (slightly less so).

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/SneeringImperialistFlavor
entry.value: "Have mercy?" Whatever. Sergeant major, put a cap in General Gobbledigook over here.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianLineFormation
entry.value: Line Formation

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianLineFormationDescription
entry.value: Increased Attacks when adjacent to Praetorian Guardsmen or Praetorian Grenadiers.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianLineFormationFlavor
entry.value: Colour sergeant, I want half your men. Form two lines, on the double.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianShockTroop
entry.value: Shock Trooper

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianShockTroopDescription
entry.value: Decreased Morale loss. Receives less Ranged Damage if the unit has moved this turn.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianShockTroopFlavor
entry.value: "Here come the grenadiers, my boys, who know no doubts or fears!"

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianOfficersDontDuck
entry.value: Praetorian Officers Don't Duck!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianOfficersDontDuckDescription
entry.value: Brave officers don't need cover.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianOfficersDontDuckFlavor
entry.value: "They couldn't hit an elephant at this range."

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianInspiration
entry.value: Praetorian Inspiration

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianInspirationDescription
entry.value: Increased morale and accuracy for Praetorians.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianIntimidation
entry.value: Praetorian Intimidation

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianIntimidationDescription
entry.value: Reduces the morale of the weak-willed, enemies and allies alike.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianFleshbaneDescription
entry.value: Increased Damage against infantry.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianCutThemDown
entry.value: Cut Them Down!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianCutThemDownDescription
entry.value: Increased Attacks against enemies with low morale.
